title: IIM Udaipur Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Various Research Assistant Posts
description: Indian Institute of Management (IIM) Udaipur has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, MBA, can grab this chance and apply for the IIM Udaipur Notification 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of applicat...
